thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Tech Data Entered Into Lender Joinder, First Revolver Increase Agreement Amending Second Amended, Restated Revolving Credit Agreement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tech Data Entered Into Lender Joinder, First Revolver Increase Agreement Amending Second Amended, Restated Revolving Credit Agreement
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Tech Data Corp:
* TECH DATA - ON JAN 31, CO ENTERED INTO LENDER JOINDER, FIRST REVOLVER INCREASE AGREEMENT AMENDING SECOND AMENDED, RESTATED REVOLVING CREDIT AGREEMENT
* TECH DATA SAYS LENDER JOINDER, FIRST REVOLVER INCREASE AGREEMENT PROVIDES INCREASE IN REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY TO $1.25 BILLION - SEC FILING Source text: [ bit.ly/2nAzxei ] Further company coverage:
